SEARCH
Package com.Dao

Class DaoUserContact

java.lang.Object
com.Dao.DaoUserContact
public class DaoUserContact extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user contact details. This class provides methods to retrieve, add, and manage user contacts and associated categories.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sahana

    • getCategoryName

      public String getCategoryName(int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the category name associated with a given category ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the category.
      Returns:
      The name of the category, or an empty string if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • Contactdisplay

      public List<BeanContactDetails> Contactdisplay() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of contact details for the current user, excluding archived contacts.
      Returns:
      A list of BeanContactDetails representing the user's contacts.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • contactDetailsRegister

      public boolean contactDetailsRegister(BeanContactDetails user)
      Registers a new contact for the current user.
      Parameters:
      user - The BeanContactDetails object containing contact information.
      Returns:
      true if the contact was successfully registered, false otherwise.
